name: The Place (dapoh games)
description:
It took 6 months to create this demo. I am a fan of such series of games as Resident Evil, Silent Hill, Dead Space, Mass Effect. Also, I was inspired by such films as Alien, The thing, Predator, Blade Runner, Prometheus and others.  In this demo, I tried to convey the atmosphere of retro representations of the science fiction of the future.  Old journals and scientific hypotheses were also used.

If the project collects sufficient financial support, absolutely everything in the game will be transferred from scratch and meet the required quality.  This will allow me to switch game development to a new version of the engine (currently using iMac 21'mid 2011 + Unity 5.6.4f), which requires more powerful hardware.A large story campaign requires a lot of resources and I have a lot to tell you. Check out the roadmap for details. I would be very happy if you share your impressions so that I can make the game better.

========

Known bugs:

_Inventory is not saved when switching to a new scene or when saving.

_Some items may not have a correct description.

_Occasionally, during the game, long freezes / intermittent screen movement may occur.

Have a good game. Thank you for your attention.
